name: Cyber Abyss
description:
Cyber Abyss

This game was created for the #cyberpunkjam 2014.
We know this game is pretty hard. 

So we decided to give away a personalized pixel avatar to the first one to play through it. 

(Please provide a screenshot of the ending message)

Team:
  • @nyrrrr
  • @d__adee

Controls:

  • Move: Arrowkeys
  • Sword: Ctrl / Space / left mouse
